summary: This mod adds a forge into every home in vanilla skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/694/forgeineveryhouse.jpg/]       [IMG]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/7488/forgeineveryhouse.jpg[/IMG][/URL]




Description:

This mod adds a forge into every home in vanilla skyrim. The forge is accessible via a trap door located in the home. The forge includes all of the tools a blacksmith needs including:

- Blacksmith Forge

- Workbench

- Tanning Rack

- Smelter

- Grindstone

- Chests

- Various books on a book shelf(including a few skill books).


How to install(without NMM)

1. Download the file manually in the download section

2. Navigate to your skyrim folder

3. Go into Data

4. Drag and drop the file into it

Compatibility:

Compatible with Dovahkiin Hideout and anything that doesn\'t place an object
over the location of the trap doors.

Planned Features:

- In-forge merchant

- More storage

- Smithing Trainer
